pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Bindings for Calling the 'Earth Engine' API // Earth Engine https://earthengine.google.com/ client library for R. All of the 'Earth Engine' API classes, modules, and functions are made available. Additional functions implemented include importing (exporting) of Earth Engine spatial objects, extraction of time series, interactive map display, assets management interface, and metadata display. See https://r-spatial.github.io/rgee/ for further details.
